songs.title: Butterflyz (The Drumline Mix)
songs.album: Songs in A Minor (10th Anniversary Edition) [Collector’s Edition]
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Butterflies, butterflies...

[Verse 1]
Lately when I look into your eyes, I realize
You're the only one I need in my life
Baby, I just don't know how to describe
How lovely you make me feel inside

[Chorus]
You give me butterflyz
Got me flying so high in the sky
I can't control the butterflyz
You give me butterflyz
Got me flying so high in the sky
I can't control the butterflyz

[Verse 2]
It seemed like the likely thing
From the start you told me
I would be your queen
But never had I imagined such a feeling
Joy is what you bring
I want to give you everything

[Chorus]
You give me butterflyz
Got me flying so high in the sky
I can't control the butterflyz
You give me butterflyz
Got me flying so high in the sky
I can't control the butterflyz

[Bridge]
You and I are destiny
I know now you were made for me
Oh, ooh, I can't control it
It's driving me, taking over me and I...

[Chorus]
You give me butterflyz
Got me flying so high in the sky
I can't control the butterflyz
You give me butterflyz
Got me flying so high in the sky
I can't control the butterflyz

You give me butterflyz
Got me flying so high in the sky
I can't control the butterflyz
You give me butterflyz
Got me flying so high in the sky
I can't control the butterflyz
Oh, oh no, oh no

[Outro]
You give me something I just can't deny
Something that's so real
I just can't control the way I feel inside of me
You give me something I just can't deny
Something that's so real
I just can't control the way I feel
Oh, I've never Felt like this
